data.comment: The match has started.
Lassana Faye is booked for the away team.
In the minute 34, Ilay Elmkies (Den Haag) has received a yellow card from Sander van der Eijk.
The first-half has come to a close in Utrecht.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Rene Hake is making the team's first substitution at Stadion Galgenwaard with Adrian Dalmau replacing Joris Overeem.
The away team have replaced Ilay Elmkies with Samy Bourard. This is the first substitution made today by Ruud Brood.
Justin Hoogma scores to make it 1-0 at Stadion Galgenwaard.
In the minute 48, That's a fine assist from Mark Van der Maarel.
Adrian Dalmau (Utrecht) has received a first yellow card.
Bilal Ould-Chikh is on a sub for Ricardo Kishna for Den Haag.
In the minute 66, Adrian Dalmau (Utrecht) leaves the pitch after receiving two yellow cards.
Simon Gustafson (Utrecht) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Utrecht make their second substitution with Leon Guwara replacing Bart Ramselaar.
In the minute 78, The home team replace Mimoun Mahi with Eljero Elia.
Jonas Arweiler is replacing Pascu for the away team.
Rene Hake (Utrecht) is making a fourth substitution, with Willem Janssen replacing Gyrano Kerk.
In the minute 85, Goal! Den Haag go level at 1-1 through Michiel Kramer in Utrecht.
Great play from Kees de Boer to set up the goal.
Full-time! The final score is 1-1.
Den Haag's Samy Bourard has been booked in Utrecht.
At Stadion Galgenwaard, Vicente Besuijen has been yellow-carded for the away team.
